name: Castle Invaders (Stephen Hubbard)
description:
Defend your castle by clearing waves of pirates until defeat!

TIPS:  

-Drag friendly units into the barrel if you need to destroy them.  

-Max units indicated by the blue flag.

-Enemy's health and damage will scale exponentially with each wave. 

If you'd like to check out the corresponding dev log I made:  

Assets I used are free assets thanks to (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/31120).
